charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw a bright light
coming from the beach, so [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] went there to see
what was going on.
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_0200_1: OK, Dawn! Go ahead and give it your all!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_0500_1: Well, it was a lot of power, but...
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1000_1:
Actually, we’re in the middle of some research on
sync stones right now.
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1100_1:
Since the power of sync stones on Pasio seems to
affect a lot of different things, it’s a fascinating
topic to delve into!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1200_1:
I was trying out a bunch of stuff so I can have
more to add in my report about the PML for
Professor Rowan, but...
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1300_1: Oh, come on! Our sync move just now was great!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1400_1:
Yeah, it really was! But that’s why I think you
can do even better!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1500_1:
In order to do that, we need to learn more about
these sync stones!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1600_1:
I’ve heard that the power of sync stones correlates
with how strong your bond is. But it’s hard to
suddenly strengthen a bond without a trigger, so...
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1700_1:
Oh, there you go again, getting lost in
your thoughts!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1800_1:
If we give it a try and it doesn’t work, all we
have to do is try again!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_1900_1: I’ll help you out as much as you want!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_2100_1:
Since everyone’s helping me out, there’s no need
to keep thinking about it all by myself!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_2200_1:
Exactly! If you’re not sure about something, we
can just test it out!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_2400_1:
That positive attitude of yours is always such a big
help, Dawn!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_2500_1: Well, well. You’re doing something interesting.
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_2600_1:
If we get our hands on that sync stone research,
that’ll be our shortcut to getting stronger!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_2700_1:
This is precious info that Dawn and the rest of
my friends are helping me research!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_2800_1: There’s no way I’m handing it over to you!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_3100_1:
What’s that light... A sync move?! How can it be
so strong?
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_3300_1:
Oh, they’re gone... They just gave up before the
battle even started! What a spineless bunch.
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_0301_3400_1: What was that light just now?
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_0401_3500_1:
Yeah, I was curious about that, too! It was
brighter than anything we’ve seen yet!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_0402_3700_1:
Yeah! That was even brighter than anything we’ve
seen so far!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_3900_1:
The power of a sync move comes from the
strength of your bond.
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_4000_1:
I bet you were both feeling strongly about that
situation just now, right? That you didn’t want
to lose?
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_4100_1:
Well, there’s no way we were gonna let them get
away with stealing your research, right?
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_4200_1:
I get it now! That means the bright light we just
saw was the result of your bond getting stronger!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_4300_1:
I feel like we're always thinking more about bonds
whenever we hang out with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_4400_1:
Yeah. I’m glad you’re our friend,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0162_00_koki/2301_1201_4500_1:
I get the feeling fun things’ll keep happening when
you’re around!
